pullrequest.title: SpawnJoint tests for ODE and bullet

content.raw:
In my nightly testing, I see several tests that fail 5% of the time or less. These debug statements are useful for the last 5%, and since pull requests will often get approved if tests pass 95% of the time, this is a practical concern.

Given the 5% issue, it's hard for me to feel that tests are ever fully "done and in place", and I still see value in having debug statements like this.
content.html:
